# NETWORK::SET_ENTITY_GHOSTED_FOR_GHOST_PLAYERS

## Summary
Sets an entity to be displayed as ghosted for any player that is a ghost. Currently only works for networked entities

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **BOOL** set
